page.title: 09A pupils day in Enniskillen.
page.content: Another school day. It was 8 o'clock and time to get ready. I got up washed & dressed.After a quick breakfast, I walked to the bus stop. When we arrived at school, classes had already started. First we had English followed by General Science. At 11 o'clock the bell rang for a well deserved break. I sat down & enjoyed a packet of crisps. After fetching books from the wooden lockers I dashed off to class.At dinner time I took a packed lunch in the assembly hall, then went outside. The afternoon was most enjoyable when 2 periods were P.E. here we played netball & hockey. We then changed back into school uniform & went home by school bus. When I got home I did my homework, had tea watched television & went to bed.
